title: Lost Love
description: Lost Love The Zankli Chronicles Book One The story sizzles as Zankli descendant and soldier of fortune, Andre Dunn and his Chosen, cosmetic heiress, Tyler Mueller find, loose, and regain love. Their passion for one another is ignited in a high-rise conference room, simmers in the African bush, and overcomes deceit, treachery, and betrayal in the corridors of corporate America. Their flight across continents exposes family secrets and uncovers a legacy of power gifted at the dawn of time.
author: M.J. Duffy
